program main

   implicit none

   integer :: n, m, i, j

   character(len=100000) :: str

   character(len=4) :: first_output

   character(len=20) :: second_output_str

   character(len=20) :: third_input

   character :: last_char

   logical :: is_vowel

   integer(8) :: mod_value = 1000000007

   ! First step

   read *, n

   read *, str

   ! Check if the string is made of two copies of its first half

   if (len_trim(str) /= n) then

      ! Assuming input is correct, so skip error handling

   end if

   first_output = 'No'

   if (mod(n,2) == 0) then

      character(len=n/2) :: a

      a = str(1:n/2) if (str == a // a) then

         first_output = 'Yes'

      end if

   end if

   ! Second step

   character(len=4) :: second_input = first_output

   m = len_trim(second_input)

   integer(8), dimension(0:m, 0:1) :: dp

   dp = 0

   dp(0,0) = 1

   do i = 1, m

      character :: current_char = second_input(i:i)

      ! First part of the loop

      if (current_char == '0') then

         dp(i,0) = dp(i-1,0)

         dp(i,1) = dp(i-1,1)

      else

         dp(i,1) = mod(dp(i-1,0) + dp(i-1,1), mod_value)

program main

   implicit none

   integer :: n, m, i, j

   character(len=100000) :: str

   character(len=4) :: first_output

   character(len=20) :: second_output_str

   character(len=20) :: third_input

   character :: last_char

   logical :: is_vowel

   integer(8) :: mod_value = 1000000007

   ! First step

   read *, n

   read *, str

   ! Check if the string is made of two copies of its first half

   if (len_trim(str) /= n) then

      ! Assuming input is correct, so skip error handling

   end if

   first_output = 'No'

   if (mod(n,2) == 0) then

      character(len=n/2) :: a

      a = str(1:n/2)

      if (str == a // a) then

         first_output = 'Yes'

      end if

   end if

   ! Second step

   character(len=4) :: second_input = first_output

   m = len_trim(second_input)

   integer(8), dimension(0:m, 0:1) :: dp

   dp = 0

   dp(0,0) = 1

   do i = 1, m

      character :: current_char = second_input(i:i)

      ! First part of the loop

      if (current_char == '0') then

         dp(i,0) = dp(i-1,0)

         dp(i,1) = dp(i-1,1)

      else

         dp(i,1) = mod(dp(i-1,0) + dp(i-1,1), mod_value)

      end if

      ! Second part of the loop

      if (current_char == '0') then

         integer(8) :: temp

         temp = mod(dp(i-1,1)*2, mod_value)

         dp(i,1) = mod(dp(i,1) + temp, mod_value)

      else

         integer(8) :: temp0, temp1

         temp0 = mod(dp(i-1,0)*2, mod_value)

         temp1 = mod(dp(i-1,1)*2, mod_value)

         dp(i,0) = mod(dp(i,0) + temp0, mod_value)

         dp(i,1) = mod(dp(i,1) + temp1, mod_value)

      end if

   end do

   integer(8) :: result_second = mod(dp(m,0) + dp(m,1), mod_value)

   ! Convert result_second to string

   write(second_output_str, '(I0)') result_second

   ! Third step

   third_input = second_output_str

   last_char = ' '

   do j = len_trim(third_input), 1, -1

      character :: c = third_input(j:j)

      if (c /= ' ' .and. c /= '?') then

         last_char = c

         exit

      end if

   end do

   ! Convert to lowercase

   if (last_char >= 'A' .and. last_char <= 'Z') then

      last_char = char(ichar(last_char) + 32)

   end if

   is_vowel = .false.

   select case (last_char)

   case ('a', 'e', 'i', 'o', 'u', 'y')

      is_vowel = .true.

   end select

   if (is_vowel) then

      print *, 'YES'

   else

      print *, 'NO'

   end if

end program main

program main

   implicit none

   integer :: n, m, i, j

   character(len=100000) :: str

   character(len=4) :: first_output

   character(len=20) :: second_output_str

   character(len=20) :: third_input

   character :: last_char

   logical :: is_vowel

   integer(8) :: mod_value = 1000000007

   ! First step

   read *, n

   read *, str

   ! Check if the string is made of two copies of its first half

   first_output = 'No'

   if (mod(n,2) == 0) then

      character(len=n/2) :: a

      a = str(1:n/2)

      if (str == a // a) then

         first_output = 'Yes'

      end if

   end if

   ! Second step

   character(len=4) :: second_input = first_output

   m = len_trim(second_input)

   integer(8), dimension(:,:), allocatable :: dp

   allocate(dp(0:m, 0:1))

   dp = 0

   dp(0,0) = 1

   do i = 1, m

      character :: current_char = second_input(i:i)

      ! First part of the loop

      if (current_char == '0') then

         dp(i,0) = dp(i-1,0)

         dp(i,1) = dp(i-1,1)

      else

         dp(i,1) = mod(dp(i-1,0) + dp(i-1,1), mod_value)

      end if

      ! Second part of the loop

      if (current_char == '0') then

         integer(8) :: temp

         temp = mod(dp(i-1,1)*2, mod_value)

         dp(i,1) = mod(dp(i,1) + temp, mod_value)

      else

         integer(8) :: temp0, temp1

         temp0 = mod(dp(i-1,0)*2, mod_value)

         temp1 = mod(dp(i-1,1)*2, mod_value)

         dp(i,0) = mod(dp(i,0) + temp0, mod_value)

         dp(i,1) = mod(dp(i,1) + temp1, mod_value)

      end if

   end do

   integer(8) :: result_second = mod(dp(m,0) + dp(m,1), mod_value)

   deallocate(dp)

   ! Convert result_second to string

   write(second_output_str, '(I0)') result_second

   ! Third step

   third_input = second_output_str

   last_char = ' '

   do j = len_trim(third_input), 1, -1

      character :: c = third_input(j:j)

      if (c /= ' ' .and. c /= '?') then

         last_char = c

         exit

      end if

   end do

   ! Convert to lowercase

   if (last_char >= 'A' .and. last_char <= 'Z') then

      last_char = char(ichar(last_char) + 32)

   end if

   is_vowel = .false.

   select case (last_char)

   case ('a', 'e', 'i', 'o', 'u', 'y')

      is_vowel = .true.

   end select

   if (is_vowel) then

      print *, 'YES'

   else

      print *, 'NO'

   end if

end program main
